title: Ep. - 200 - GLORIETTA AND LIZZIE FROM LOVE AFTER LOCKUP
description:
Glorietta and Lizzie from Love After Lockup, a series about couples who fall in love despite the prison bars between them, talk about how they were cast for the show and give updates on their relationships. 


Famed hairstylist Julius Michael reviews the documentary The Family I Had, about a mother who recounts how her seemingly ideal family was shattered after her brilliant son committed a violent act.


Ryan Bailey reviews Welcome to Plathville, a new series on TLC about a family who purposely has chosen to raise their children without television or the Internet. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

Patron: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles
